creator: PTI
title: SBI to auction 12 bad accounts this month to recover over Rs 1325cr
dc:creator: PTI
content: State Bank of India (SBI) said interested bidders can conduct due diligence of these assets with immediate effect after submitting the expression of interest and executing a non-disclosure agreement with the bank.
